alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:48AM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1100 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek at Bundick Lake. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 97.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the lake, especially the north end of the lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 96.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 97.0 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 96.0 Thu 9 am CST 96.6 96.9 97.0 &&
